name: Beneath (itch) (Lorelock)
description:
Beneath is a 2D dungeon-crawler/roguelike game created on Unity 5. Build your own story through game play inspired by the classic video game era of the 1980s. Forge a legend that will be told for a thousand years.

"Betrayed by the people you protected and exiled to ancient dungeons. You were a knight of many kingdoms, holding countless titles and held in high regard by the masses. But your deeds above ground mean nothing now, only the ability to survive holds merit.

When the only way is down, there is only one option:

Make them remember your name."
